All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ConfFileParser
The ConfFileParser class will parse any given formatted text file for configuration variables.
Constants
The Constants class stores important variables as constants for later use.
DataReader
The DataReader class facilitates reading data from data streams.
GameClient
The GameClient class is an extension of the Thread class that represents an individual client.
GamePacket
GamePacket sent by the server.
GamePacketStream
The GamePacketStream contain methods that pushes the response information as bytes into the output stream.
GameRequest
The GameRequest class is an abstract class used as a basis for storing request information.
GameRequestTable
The GameRequestTable class stores a mapping of unique request code numbers with its corresponding request class.
GameResponse
The GameResponse class is an abstract class used as a basis for storing response information.
GameServer
The GameServer class serves as the main module that runs the server.
GameServerConf
The GameServerConf class stores important variables such as the port number to be used for the server from the configuration file.
Log
The Log class provide methods to store any message output to a file or display them to the console.
NetworkManager
 
Player
The Player class holds important information about the player including, most importantly, the account.
RequestHeartbeat
The RequestHeartbeat class is mainly used to release all pending responses the client.
RequestInteract
 
RequestJoin
The RequestLogin class authenticates the user information to log in.
RequestLeave
 
RequestMove
 
RequestName
 
RequestReady
 
ResponseInteract
The ResponseLogin class contains information about the authentication process.
ResponseJoin
The ResponseLogin class contains information about the authentication process.
ResponseLeave
The ResponseLogin class contains information about the authentication process.
ResponseMove
The ResponseLogin class contains information about the authentication process.
ResponseName
The ResponseLogin class contains information about the authentication process.
ResponseReady
The ResponseLogin class contains information about the authentication process.
